segments.text: Hey Joe , what are you doing in this department store ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Rita , I ’ m just looking for a pair of shoes . I won ’ t be here for long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? When I go shoe shopping , I have so many options for sneakers that I spend awhile looking at all of the choices .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s my problem . I don ’ t have a lot of options .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So how do you usually go about buying shoes , then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , first of all , I can only go to certain stores that can guarantee me a large selection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you ’ re in the right store . If they don ’ t have it , no one will .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After that I choose something from one of the few brands that I know will fit me . I prefer white , so I ask them to bring me a pair of white sneakers in my size . Since I ’ m usually only given one or two pairs of shoes that meet my qualifications , it makes it a very easy choice .
segments.speaker: S2
